document_data.name: Camphor
document_data.mainbody: '''Camphor''' was an aromatic plant [[resin]] used in rituals and medical treatments.
document_data.Availability:
[[Aurora's Emporium]] sold raw camphor resin for 1 [[sp]] per {{SI|6|oz}}, and processed camphor for 8 sp per {{SI|4|oz}}, intended for use by [[priest]]s as an aromatic ritual reagent.

Camphor trees were widely found throughout [[Kara-Tur]] and [[Malatra]],{{Cite dungeon/9/The Golden Bowl of Ashu H'San|41}} with camphor oil a common export of [[Binkohn]] in [[Laothan]].

In [[Zakhara]], camphor was harvested and exported from the islands of the [[Crowded Sea]] and the jungles of the eastern [[Ruined Kingdoms]] and [[Afyal]].
document_data.Usage:
Camphor resin was used as an aromatic [[incense]]. It was also used for a number of medical purposes, including the treatment of sprains and bruises, reducing chills and fevers, and as a heart stimulant.

Camphor resin was a relatively common and mundane (though expensive) [[material component]]. The ''[[repel insects]]'' spell could use a lump of camphor resin.
